actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain organizations which are dedicated to honoring and preserving the memory of former Presidents will not be treated as private foundations.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from the definition of a private foundation an organization which is federally chartered and which is organized for the purpose of honoring the memory of a former President of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain organizations which are dedicated to honoring and preserving the memory of former Presidents will not be treated as private foundations.
